title: Applicant name
question: What is the other applicant’s name?
content1: The name you give us will be written on the grant of probate.
content2:
Their name should match exactly what is written on their passport or other official 
identification document, such as a driving licence.
content3:
You should make sure that this is the same form of identification they use when 
they are dealing with {{ deceased name }}’s estate.
warningText:
If the name on the grant does not match the identification they use, they may 
have difficulties dealing with the estate.

firstName.required: Enter your first name, including any middle names
firstName.invalid: Enter a valid first name - can only contain letters a to z, spaces, hyphens and apostrophes

lastName.invalid: Enter a valid last name - can only contain letters a to z, spaces, hyphens and apostrophes
